label: St Michael's Church
column5: The marks are tightly clustered within the porch area
column6: specifically carved into the lowest stones above the benches on both the east and west sides
column8: while no such marks appear elsewhere on the building.

label: All Saint's Church
column5: Look for the marks on an outside corner of the building.

label: St Mary's Church
column5: Look to the bottom of one of the external buttresses.

label: St Dunstan's Church
column5: Look to a corner where two external walls meet.
